content: ## Pull work to production Your work is now in GitHub. If you're using a multi-branch setup, it's on the development branch. If you chose the single-branch setup, it's on main. === "Multi-branch" 1. In GitHub, create a pull request to merge development into production. 1. Merge the pull request. 1. In your production instance, select **Pull** ![Pull icon](/_images/source-control-environments/pull-icon.png){.off-glb} in the main menu. === "Single-branch" In your production instance, select **Pull** ![Pull icon](/_images/source-control-environments/pull-icon.png){.off-glb} in the main menu. --8<-- "_snippets/source-control-environments/push-pull-menu-state.md"
